snippet.title: We Are Screwed! - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
We Are Screwed! is launching into Early Access on March 1!
Save the Multiverse in We Are Screwed!, a chaotic co-op space action game for 1-4 players! Team up and face swarms of foes as you pilot your way through a procedurally generated galaxy. Blast your enemies, extinguish fires, clean up, repair, recycle, and explore where no one has screwed up before!

WISHLIST NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1125830/We_Are_Screwed/

Stay up to date with We Are Screwed! and Rarebyte: 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/rarebyte
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RarebyteGameDev
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wearescrewedgame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rarebyte/

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/rarebyte

#wearescrewed #indiegame #spacegame
